title: Week of September 28 - October 2, 2015
content:
Monday, September 28
Foundations of Art:Review of clay terms, create gnome heads & facial features
Beginning Drawing:Project #1 Still Life with Value
Introduction to Art:Sketchbook Assignment 3
Sculpture:Relief Sculpture reference cultures and create images
Portfolio Prep:Cubism Project - 3 still life contour drawings done from different vantage points
Beginning Digital Photography:Name Assignment
